body.p: There are many mailing lists in the Hadoop project. Please use the appropriate list described below. In most cases it is necessary to first subscribe to a list before posting to it.

td.strong: Primary list for Hadoop user questions.

tr.td: A private list for security sensitive issues. You may post potential security vunerabilities here.

Hadoop project level annoucements and discussions. All Hadoop releases are announced on this list.
NOTE: This mailing list is not for end-user questions and discussion. Please use a more-specific subproject's -user mailing list for such issues.
For those contributing to the development (code, documentation and tests) of the Hadoop Common project.
For those contributing to the development (code, documentation and tests) of the Hadoop HDFS project.
For those contributing to the development (code, documentation and tests) of the Hadoop MapReduce project
